Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 9 -- $32.00 Service Charge - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 9 Proposition
(Renewal)

Summary:  Renewal of a $32.00, 10 year annual service charge for paying the costs of fire protection services in and for the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 9 of the Parish of Livingston, State of Louisiana (the "District"), assess and collect an annual service charge of not to exceed Thirty-Two Dollars ($32.00) (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the Service Charge for one entire year being $62,944) from persons owning residential or commercial structures, whether occupied or unoccupied, located wholly or partly within the boundaries of the District, for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, for the purpose of paying the costs of fire protection services in and for the District, and for purposes of assessing and collecting said service charge, owners shall be assessed a service charge for each such structure which they own, each residential or commercial unit and each housing unit within a multiple dwelling structure shall be considered a separate structure and a mobile home, as defined in R.S. 9:1149.2(3), shall be considered a structure?
